= Citations =

{{{
- there are many more projections from amygdala to hippocampus than in opposite direction
- strongest projection is from lateral nucleus to entorhinal cortex 
(ie, the cortical area from which the hippocampus receives most sensory input) 
- secondary projections arise primarily the parvicellular division
of basal nucleus, which receives most of return connections 
(from the CA1/subiculum border zone and entorhinal cortex)
}}}
